column2: film=[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)

column1: New Zealand director, actor and musician '''Harry Sinclair''' played [[Isildur]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. He is a friend of [[Peter Jackson]], and was offered the role because he was the most corrupt-looking person Jackson knew. He had only one line, but because he did not sound as corrupt, it was dubbed by [[Hugo Weaving]].

It was great. I did some huge battle scenes, like 700 people on a mountainside. And the New Zealand Army were some of the extras. They'd yell 'CUT!' but some of these guys just kept hackin' away at each other.

column1: * [[2004]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age]]'' - [[Isildur]] (archive footage)
* [[2003]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' - Isildur
* [[2001]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' - Isildur
